error.contentTreks: Please make sure you are logged in to access the full hikes list
error.contentMore: Please make sure you are logged in to access additional information
error.contentMoreItem: Please make sure you are logged in to access the information

trekCard.errorWhileDeleting: An error occurred while removing the hike

inAppDisclosure.title: Use of your location
inAppDisclosure.description: We will ask your permission to use your location.
inAppDisclosure.geolocateFeatures: The application uses your location to :
inAppDisclosure.geolocateForMap: Be able to find your way on the maps
inAppDisclosure.geolocateForSort: Sort the list of hikes by proximity
inAppDisclosure.geolocateForNavigate: Always center the map of a hike on your location
inAppDisclosure.geolocateForNotification: Show local notifications, when you activate the option from the map of a hike, to inform you of the presence of a POI nearby. This feature uses your location even if the application is in the background
inAppDisclosure.dataUsage: We do not collect any location.
